name: SalesPurchaseTracker
tagline: Sales Purchase Tracker software enables user to manage his business's sales & purchase. It maintains stock, saves bills, calculates profit-loss and VAT.
body:
### Welcome to Sales Purchase tracker.
SalesPurchaseTracker makes your life easy by providing an user friendly way of managing your business's sales & purchase and VAT calculation.
you can check out the new branch:

```
$ cd sayan801/SalesPurchaseTracker
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout SalesPurchaseTracker
```



### Quick Start Guide
Sales Purchase Tracker software enables user to manage his business's sales & purchase. It maintains stock, saves bills, calculates profit-loss and VAT. More detailed user guide coming soon.

### Features
* sales billing
* purchase billing
* sales list
* purchase list
* stock management
* saves bills
* calculates profit-loss 
* VAT calculation
* GST calculation

### Authors and Contributors
In 2011, Chandra Shekhar Sengupta (@sayan801), Amit Paul (@amit-paul),  Anirban Nandy (@anirban-nandy), Shovan Saha(@shovan-saha), and Joysankar Sengupta (@shantu) started SalesPurchaseTracker.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with SPT? Check out the documentation at http://technicise.com/#SPT or contact info@technicise.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
